title: Cindy Crawford means business in blazer with leather jacket as she holds onto husband Rande Gerber
text:
They danced the night away at the Casamigos Halloween Party over the weekend.

But it was back to reality for Cindy Crawford and her husband Rande Gerber on Wednesday.

The supermodel, 53, held onto her husband, 57, while taking a stroll together through New York City.

Hitting their stride! Cindy Crawford and her husband Rande Gerber enjoyed a stroll together through New York City on Wednesday

Cindy had a smile on her face as she tenderly held onto her husband's arm while juggling a purse across her other shoulder.

And the model was definitely dressed for success for the power walk.

Cindy looked incredible rocking a pinstripe blazer with dressy pair of leather trousers, which added an edgy touch to her look.

She slicked her hair back into a ponytail while concealing her eyes behind stylish shades.

In sync: The couple remained by each other's sides as they explored the Big Apple together

She means business: Cindy looked incredible rocking a pinstripe blazer with dressy pair of leather trousers, adding an edgy touch to her look

Rande opted for something a little more casual with his a navy blue jacket, jeans, and black T-shirt.

The outfits were definitely a far cry from what the couple wore on Saturday night.

Cindy and Rande hosted the Casamigos Halloween Party in Beverly Hills, where the supermodel dressed as a disco queen while her husband was the ultimate hippie dude.

Dancing queen! Crawford was having the time of her life hosting the Casamigos Halloween Party over the weekend in Beverly Hills

Rande co-founded Casamigos Tequila back in 2013 with George Clooney and Mike Meldman.

The three sold the spirit for $700 million in 2017, with an additional $300 million payout possible if the product performs well over the next 10 years.

Rande has been married to Cindy since 1998 and together they have daughter Kaia, 18, and son Presley, 20.
description: The supermodel, 53, held onto her husband, 57, while taking a stroll together through New York City. Cindy had a smile on her face as she tenderly held onto her husband's arm.
